reviewText: Love this mousse.mholds great and adds glamour.
It did what we wanted it to
I couldn't even notice this on my hair.  I tried toning down brassy tones but this did not do the trick and left my hair sticky as if I had used  a lot of hair spray.
best Silver Mousse for my Gray Hair ,I always had to buy it in Germany thanks to Amazon .less in my Suitcase
Great product.  Have used for over a year

A little too much bluing in this product.  I have to use only a very small amount [less than I really need for the job] or else my pure silver-white hair will have a purple cast to it.  Otherwise I like it for it's property of preventing brassiness.
Great for blond or silver hair takes out the yellow.
Just what I was looking for.
